name: stirfry's Rhythm Rave
description:
This is a story of a rooster's inability to cluck. So he must travel up a mountain to find a party so that he may learn to cluck. It makes sense if you don't think about it.

Controls:
"A" and "D" for Left and Right. Double press with the rhythm to speed forward.
"Space Bar" to jump. Press with rhythm to jump higher.

Move with the rhythm to progress through the game and find your cluck!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/joltjab

Twitch: http://twitch.tv/joltjab

Discord: https://discord.gg/8VvrVN6
